article.headline: Uber may buy ride-hailing app from Daimler and BMW: report
article.body: Uber Technologies UBER, -0.18% is considering buying the ride-hailing app Free Now to boost its presence in Europe and Latin America, Bloomberg News reported, citing people familiar with the matter. Free Now is a venture of Daimler DAI, -1.01% and BMW BMW, -1.55%. The venture's efforts to attract more investors recently struggled to gain traction amid the coronavirus pandemic, the report said.
